mapper.select: SELECT SC.SUB_CONTENTS_ID as SC_ID, SC.VM_VER as OS_VER, SC.APK_VER as VER_CD, SC.APK_VER_NM as VER FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SD INNER JOIN TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC ON SC.PROD_ID = SD.PROD_ID AND SC.SUB_CONTENTS_ID = SD.SUB_CONTENTS_ID WHERE 1=1 AND SD.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND SD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd}
